results.definition: capable of being assigned or credited to
examples: the cancellation of the concert was due to the rain

results.definition: a payment that is due (e.g., as the price of membership)
examples: the society dropped him for non-payment of dues

results.definition: owed and payable immediately or on demand

examples: the train is due in 15 minutes

results.definition: that which is deserved or owed
suitable to or expected in the circumstances
